text: Is there a way to mimic `Iterators.accumulate` in Julia v1.0.5 without an external package?

text: also I would not recommend using 1.05 unless you really need the utmost stability. 1.5.3 (or 1.6 once it's out) are noticably faster and pretty much better in every way
